title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. I, pt. 21 - Textbooks
content:

State Regulations
§ 21.1 - Seditious or disloyal matter
§ 21.2 - Lending procedures
§ 21.3 - Lending procedures for computer software and instructional computer hardware
§ 21.4 - Lending procedures for school library materials

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. I, pt. 21

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§ 101, 207, 215, 305[1]-[2], 701, 712, 751, 752[1], 753[1], 754[1], 4401; L. 1999, ch. 405, § 8; L. 2007, ch. 57, §§ 7-a, 7-b

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
